page.title: 20PRINCIPLE FEATURES
page.content:
cricket and football. {Changes in Rhosesmor since 1945} The village has changed considerably. It is much bigger with many more homes and people, increasing all the time. There are also factories. The old village school has been closed and partly demolished, the rest becoming a private home. It is much harder to get out and about now as the bus service is moch poorer and very few busses pass through. There used to be local carnivals and a carnival queen but that has all gone.
{CREDITS:}Schools participating: {Alun School, Mold:-}Miss J. Thompson, Mr. G. Williams, Mr. S. Corkett, S. Bartlett, Mrs. S. Stowell, Mrs.E. Hird {Rhosesmor C.P. :-}Mr. H. Jones {Soughton C.P. :-}Mr. J. Roberts and their respective pupils.
